segments.text: Welcome to the McDonald's . What will it be for you , madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One Big Mac and French Fries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this to go or to eat here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That comes to four dollars and ten cents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And can I have some ketchup , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's on the service counter over there . Please go to help yourself .
segments.speaker: S1
